content: k2 decrease twice cut yarn leaving a tail to sew up thread through remaining stitches and pull tight sew into a disc shape and fasten_off leaf using green yarn cast on 2 stitches row 1 purl row2 rs kfbl twice 4sts row3 purl row 4 kfbl k2 kfbl 6 sts row 5 purl row 6 kfbl k4 kfbl 8 sts row 7 purl row 8 cast off 2 knit to end row 9 cast off 2 purl to end row 10 kfbl k2 kfbl 6 sts row 11 purl row 12 kfbl k4 kfbl 8 sts row 13 cast off 3 knit to end row 14 cast off 3 purl to end row 15 kfbl k2 kfbl 6 sts row 16 purl row 17 kfbl k4 kfbl 8 sts row 18 purl row 19 k2 decrease k4 k2 decrease 6 sts row 20 purl row 21 k2tog k2 k2tog 4sts row 22 purl row 23 k2tog twice cut yarn and pull through remaining stiches to make a nice pointy leaf finishing sew the disc to the centre of the poppy alternatively you could use a button sew the leaf to the back of the poppy with the right side showing when you look at the front of the poppy sew the brooch pin on to the back you could use a safety pin © caroline spillane c spillane@sky com knitting rules ok the twist row 7 knit 6 row in garter stitch row seven after every 7th stitch twist the stitches in the left hand needle one full turn away from you before twist after twist …and you should end up with this © caroline spillane c spillane@sky com knitting rules ok
